website_summaries.verdict: Beginner-level Spanish set with kid-themed easy readers. Corresponding recordings of native Spanish-speaking kids helps non-natives with pronunciations and accents.
pros: Comes with 10 Spanish easy readers and online access to native Spanish recordings
Themed stories involve real-life topics for kids
Fun, attractive illustrations that draw kids in
cons: A high price for small paperback books, but the audio resources are a terrific value

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for a Spanish equivalent for Bob's books and this is one of the best products I've found
customer_reviews.text: I'm a native speaker teaching my daughter at home. I have been looking for a Spanish equivalent for Bob's books and this is one of the best products I've found. I really hope the publisher is working on additional sets! We have enjoyed these books so much!
customer_reviews.author: DanielaC

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: We are a bilingual family and I am teaching my five-year-old to read both in English and Spanish. Great books but there was a mistake on at least one of the books. I have not checked each book yet to see if there was any other mistakes. But overall happy with these books.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of entry level spanish books
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of books that have cute illustrations. My 5 yr old daughter wants to learn spanish, and these are simple and short to keep her attention and also learn basic words. The inside of the front and back cover of each book has translation for the words used in the book, which is very handy to go over the story so she can learn the meaning of the words. I like the simplicity of them, they are comparable to BOB books but in spanish. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amie A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner books!
customer_reviews.text: I love these books. They are simple and teach the noted vocabulary in a manner that keeps the attention of children. When you scan the barcode with your phone, you will go directly to a website that offers an audio presentation of the book (with corresponding background noises). I will buy set 2 when we are ready for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mauldin

customer_reviews.title: Great set of books
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set of books! Both my 6 year old and 11 year old are able to read them and are now ready to move on to a more challenging set of books! I have recommended them to others as well. The books are easy to read and have nice illustrations to go along with the vocabulary.
customer_reviews.author: Leen Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good for teaching 4 and 6 yo Spanish!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Paid $25, a little pricey for what you get. But the kids enjoy them. They are entertaining, easy to read, and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not for classroom use!
customer_reviews.text: The concept and the idea are very good but it is over simplified with no value for educational classroom purposes. It is cute and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: pereira80

customer_reviews.title: Great books for Spanish students!
customer_reviews.text: I love these books! They are great for both kids (and adults like myself beginning to learn Spanish). I'm going to share them with my niece who is in 5th grade and has been showing in interest in learning Spanish. I just ordered the English set to use with my third grade Spanish-speaking newcomer students at school. I am sure they will love them. Can't wait for more sets and I read that a teacher's guide is coming out soon too!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBearAndOneCub

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I loved this spanish reading book. Only one sentence per page. Translation is not for all regions. Example, there is no color such as "cafe" (coffee), the correct name should be 'marron", but based on that, my kid had so much fun, laughing at the "cafe" word.. he said,, where is the coffee? and kept laughting for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pages mixed up
customer_reviews.text: Great little books with very simple language that will help early learners of Spanish with letter sound association and basic vocabulary. However, one of the titles has the inner pages for a different title. Fotos Locas should be about the face and body, however its pages were the pages for Veo Colores were erroneously included.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the book/audio combination!
customer_reviews.text: Cute illustrations and very clever for children who cannot yet read (or sound out words) as the object of topic is colored in brightly and stands out. My son (4.5 yrs) is probably still a bit on the young side for these books, but he still had a blast with them. I highly recommend using them with the audio that is posted online. My son wanted to read one after the other with the audio (it is a pack of mini books with different topics). I think we will find that he is ready for the books very quickly as he keeps reading and listening to them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginner Readers
customer_reviews.text: These books are great for those just learning to read Spanish, kindergarten level. I like that they have the translations of the words and phrases available on the book jacket. We haven't tried ustikizingnthe audio portion of the package though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and very basic. They are a nice teaching resource, however they are not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: A. Kincheloe

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching reading for 4-6year olds
customer_reviews.text: My 4year old loves to read these. There is enough repetition to feel like a phonics book for teaching reading in Spanish.
customer_reviews.author: Isabeleeta

customer_reviews.title: 2 books with the same pages...
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited to get started! Downloaded the Audio for the books. Unfortunately, one of the books (different title) has the same pages as another. How does that happen??
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Great and fun books
customer_reviews.text: This was great! We are raising our child bilingual so these books are amazing to get her to learn to read in Spanish. She is 6 and learnt fast and found these books super good.
customer_reviews.author: Lina M. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but overall worth it!
customer_reviews.text: They are pricey for what you get as someone else said but they entertain and teach so although I wish it were cheaper, I appreciate that it's a good resource.
customer_reviews.author: Danny_SS

customer_reviews.title: Simple language to help new readers to Spanish
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for books that would be simple enough for my daughter to read with her more limited Spanish knowledge. I also wanted something that would allow her to read new words and phrases with enough context to make sense of them. These books were the perfect fit. She loves them and has read each one multiple times even though we have only had them 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: fitmommmy

customer_reviews.title: Good for little ones learning Spanish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew, who is beginning Spanish. It is a little kiddish looking but looked like it will be helpful based on reading reviews. Excited to begin to communicate with him.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: My kids want to read these every day!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! The can’t put these books down. We bought these and the Bob books to help them with their bilingual skills. They like these books more than most.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: A Spanish lesson
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent condition. The family is trying to learn another language. The book is easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unlike some books that only teach you words this ones give full useful sentences that include these oftenly used words
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed book! Unlike some books that only teach you words this ones give full useful sentences that include these oftenly used words. That's the most effective way to learn! Love it! Only wish the paper could be a bit thicker
customer_reviews.author: Jai and Vivien

customer_reviews.title: More please
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. The way they teach by repetition and color highlighting is really great. My kid is even reading them along with me. I hope they make more!
customer_reviews.author: Bilingual mom

customer_reviews.title: Me encanta estos libros
customer_reviews.text: My children like these books. I like how they repeat words to assist with learning! Me encanta estos Libros
customer_reviews.author: jennie collado

customer_reviews.title: Over-priced in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: These are super beginner books. I think they are perfect for my 4 yrs olds... however I think they are way over priced. These are very small and short paperback books.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Amini

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures! Not too many words on the page.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this Spanish course. We've downloaded the Spanish reader and she's really been able to read with correct pronunciation.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Riethmiller

customer_reviews.title: He loved it because it was fun and beautifully illustrated
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 8 year old son. He loved it because it was fun and beautifully illustrated. My son wanted to take it to school to show it to his friends and teachers. Everybody loved it! I would definitely recommend this to children who want to learn another language in a fun way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kindergartener
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kindergartener. She loves reading in Spanish and these books are very helpful. The box the books came in was all broken but the books were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Sok

customer_reviews.title: The content and easy way to show Spanish to children.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Set of Spanish cards and little books.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was more
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was more content. But my kids seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and fun language books!
customer_reviews.text: We're really enjoying these language books. The pictures are very cute and make it fun to learn words and phrases. It's a great intro for my son to learn Spanish.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to learn Spanish
customer_reviews.text: I love it, we read them every night and my daughter is really learning Spanish!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Archila

customer_reviews.title: Spanish For Kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my friend's daughter. She loves it and finds it very useful.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tower

customer_reviews.title: My 4yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old loves it! He learned to say and identify words, shapes, color, and phrases in Spanish! I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Elia Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Spanish books were a hit!
customer_reviews.text: These books have been amazing for my kindergartener! We love the repetition of the words and the pictures are adorable! We will definitely use them for the second child!
customer_reviews.author: 3vondr

customer_reviews.title: Good entry to spanish
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves reading these books and tries to read them herself
customer_reviews.author: SVLC

customer_reviews.title: Great books
customer_reviews.text: The story’s are great. My 5 year old is learning Spanish and he enjoy this book a lot
customer_reviews.author: El Rafa

customer_reviews.title: Otra, otra, otra!
customer_reviews.text: Creative storyline and delightful illustrations!! My boys (ages 7 & 10) had a ball reading them and listening to the audio. They want to know if there is going to be a second set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These books are great - the illustrations are so fun and lively that ...
customer_reviews.text: These books are great - the illustrations are so fun and lively that our kids (ages 4 and 7) want to read them over and over, all the while they are learning vocabulary in Spanish. They are good for improving my Spanish too! I highly recommend these books!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 book misprinted/mixed up....so bummed!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these books and are so excited about them, but one of the books is double printed with a different cover. So it looks like it is the last book, but once you open it is it actually a duplicate of another book in the set. My daughter is 3 and sooo sad that she can't find the story behind the cover. I can't find a way to return or exchange this or get this replaced, but I REALLY hope this company has good customer service and will replace this for us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Like Bob Books in Spanish
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoy these books as we learn Spanish and as my kid learns to read.
customer_reviews.author: Nick K

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: my 5 yr old loved every single book. It helped him a lot with the learning how to read process.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Just fyi, when people says the words are mistaken you have to consider that most Hispanic countries have their own way to say things. The word might seem wrong to me because that's not how we say it in my country, it doesn't mean it's wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Book Set for Learning Spanish
customer_reviews.text: We got a free Spanish Set One box from Language Together to try out and we are in love. The series has a website that you can go to on your computer or cell phone to play the story. We have been listening to one every morning at breakfast and I'm shocked at how much my kids are picking up. One of my main hesitations about teaching my kids another language is my terrible pronunciation and this helps immensely with this hurdle. The stories are short (2-5 minutes) and read a lot like easy readers. The stories are cute and fun. My kids look forward to them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Buhr

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have been "reading" these books to my son since he was 2 months old. He is now 4.5 months. To me the pictures in the book seem rather simple but my son LOVES all the books in this set. They are the only books he is truly interested in. I will read them myself and use the audio. He prefers the audio version because of the extra sounds in the story. I loved the different themes covered in the book and the enthusiasm the narrator has in the audio portion. I cannot wait to get set 2 and 3 when they come out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the illustrations and the easy language for beginning learners.
customer_reviews.author: melba hernandez

customer_reviews.title: the story line is easy to follow even for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I teach Spanish to grades preschool through 5th. These books are highly appealing to children. The illustrations are detailed, the story line is easy to follow even for beginners, and each book/story has a "surprise" element, adding humor and fun! The online audio is extremely well-done, as well. Highly recommend these books, and can't wait to see more from Language Together!
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent second language learning tool for children
customer_reviews.text: We recently decided to move to Spain and none in our family know Spanish. These books have been terrific to help us get our kids (3 & 5) interested in learning the language (and have taught us at the same time!). We have them as regulars in our nighttime story rotation now - so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B 172

customer_reviews.title: Great resource for beginning Spanish learning!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely illustrated, short stories that beginning students will understand right away. Great way to keep students in the target language while learning new vocabulary and grammar concepts.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Keith
